work.summary: Soundfly helps anyone anywhere become a musician. Created by a diverse and experienced team of musicians and educators, we're building a series of engaging + interactive courses that will allow aspiring musicians to improve their art and find their sound. From learning piano to booking your next tour, you can learn what you need to know to meet your musical goals.
